summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganNaturium's silky and lightweight Multi-Peptide Eye Cream is formulated with peptides, including Argireline Amplified Peptide, to help smooth and improve the look of fine lines and wrinkles, for a more refreshed and well-rested appearance.
details: DetailsBenefitsMulti-peptide blend hydrates and helps smooth appearance of fine lines and wrinklesDermatologist testedFragrance freeVegan, paraben & cruelty freeFeaturesThis peptide eye cream is packed with a multi-peptide blend featuring Argireline Amplified Peptide and vegan squalane to nourish the delicate eye area and target the visible signs of agingArgireline is a trademark of Lubrizol Advanced Materials, Inc., or its affiliatesKey IngredientsMulti-Peptide Blend: improves the appearance of fine lines & wrinkles, helps support elasticity, softens & smooths the look of skinItem 2627352How To UseUsing ring finger, gently tap a small amount around eye area morning and night.For external use only. Use only as directed.IngredientsAqua, Glycerin, Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Oil, Stearic Acid, Squalane, Glyceryl Stearate, Cetyl Alcohol, Stearyl Alcohol, Palmitic Acid, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-5, Dunaliella Salina Extract, Panthenol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydroxyacetophenone, Sorbitan Oleate, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Acrylamide/Sodium Acryloyldimethyltaurate Copolymer, Phenoxyethanol, Butylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Boron Nitride, Caprylyl Glycol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Isohexadecane, Chlorphenesin, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Sodium Hydroxide, Polysorbate 80, Carbomer, Sodium Lactate, Polysorbate 20, Citric Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Pantolactone, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate.
how_to_use: Using ring finger, gently tap a small amount around eye area morning and night.For external use only. Use only as directed.

reviews.headline: 4 1/2 Stars
reviews.comments: I just began using this eye cream. It's a bit thicker than I'm used to, but it seems to be doing a good job. 4 1/2 stars

reviews.headline: Not moisturizing enough for me
reviews.comments: This looks great at first when I apply my usual under-eye makeup, but quickly looks dry and creased, unlike my usual eye cream.

reviews.headline: My favorite eye cream
reviews.comments: This eye cream is hydrating and smooths my fine lines. I've repurchased this 4 times and have recommended it to family and friends. In fact, I enjoy many of the Naturium products - they're A great price point and they are great skincare, face & body,  products!

reviews.headline: I will buy again!
reviews.comments: I went into Ulta for an eye cream to help with circles under my eyes and lines (I'm 62).  The first cream I was shown was $100 so I asked for something more economical.  Naturium eye cream was then recommended.  Great product at a great price!

reviews.headline: The best eye cream!!
reviews.comments: This is the best eye cream I've tried. Will be purchasing again.

reviews.headline: Love this eye cream!
reviews.comments: Feels great, so smooth and hydrating! I will be purchasing again.

reviews.headline: Really love this eye cream
reviews.comments: Ive tried many eye creams and somehow I keep repurchasing this one. It works, its super hydrating and its affordable.

reviews.headline: Really love this eye cream
reviews.comments: Ive tried many eye creams and somehow I keep repurchasing this one. It works, its super hydrating and its affordable.

reviews.headline: Excellent eye cream!
reviews.comments: I'm always on the hunt for a great eye cream for maturing skin. This product has been such a pleasant surprise! It shouldn't be, because I've yet to meet a Naturium product I haven't loved! The brand somehow provides a very upscale product line at the most reasonable prices. The packaging is perfection! A squeeze tube where I don't need to dip my finger into a pot? Sign me up! It's the perfect consistency and texture - not too thick but thick enough it feels super hydrating going on, and continues to provide moisture throughout the day. I've already purchased a backup - I even have my husband using it!

reviews.headline: This should have a higher rating?!
reviews.comments: I think this is such smooth velvety eye cream. I am shocked to see if doesnt have 4.5 stars and above! Ive tried a lot of eye creams and this is a great price point for this type of cream with these ingredients

reviews.headline: Goodbye fine lines and puffy bags!
reviews.comments: I am loving this eye cream! It's very hydrating, but not too thick. My fine lines and wrinkles have massively improved since using this product! It also helps with my morning puffiness. This eye cream's only con is that if you have very dark circles, it doesn't do much for them. I do not tend to have much discoloration underneath my eyes, so this is not an issue for me.

reviews.headline: Naturium is winning my heart!
reviews.comments: I've become really interested in this brand because they provide affordable skincare with quality ingredients that feel luxurious going onto your skin. The Glow Getter Body Wash is a perfect example - it's a 20/10 for me! I also have some serums I love so decided to try the eye cream. So far, it's great! The tube packaging is something I REALLY appreciate, as I hate dipping my fingers into a jar. The consistency is perfect! Not too liquidy but not too thick. Does a great job of moisturizing the delicate skin underneath my eyes. Even my husband uses it! Gentle on skin, we will see how it hold up to my dry winter skin. So far, it's another win for Naturium!

reviews.headline: Not Moisterizing
reviews.comments: I give it a few stars for the price, however, this eye cream is not moisturizing(I have dry skin). It also doesnt have a good slip or doesnt spread nicely on the skin.

reviews.headline: Buy this eye cream!!
reviews.comments: I've been looking for eye cream without silicones at a decent price and haven't had luck until finding this product! Personally, I dislike using creams with silicones because it doesn't feel truly hydrating, just sits on the skin. No silicones and the peptides are rich but not heavy. This didn't irritate my sensitive eyes in the peak of allergy season. Give this a try!

reviews.headline: Buy this eye cream!!
reviews.comments: I've been looking for eye cream without silicones at a decent price and haven't had luck until finding this product! Personally, I dislike using creams with silicones because it doesn't feel truly hydrating, just sits on the skin. No silicones and the peptides are rich but not heavy. This didn't irritate my sensitive eyes in the peak of allergy season. Give this a try!

reviews.headline: Burned my eyes :(
reviews.comments: I wanted to like this eyecream so bad but as soon as i put it on I started to feel my skin burning. I dont have sensitive skin so I was so surprised that it cause an exteme burning sensation.

reviews.headline: Just as good as $100+ eye creams!
reviews.comments: My absolute favorite eye cream. As someone with incredibly reactive and sensitive skin, finding something that doesnt irritate me AND actually works is so hard. But this eye creams wins out over any others at this price, and I like it just as much as others I've used that are far more expensive.

reviews.headline: Luxury eye cream, drugstore price!
reviews.comments: This is super lightweight but feels buttery and luxurious on the eyes. It doesnt irrite sensitive eyes and it really hydrates and makes concealer look amazing. You only need a small amount. It also is unscented. The packaging is also nice!

faceoff_positive.comments:
I am obsessed with this eye cream. It's truly the best one out there; just hydrating and occlusive enough without clogging my skin, really nourishing, works great with reusable eye masks and under make up.

I am writing a review because I am hoping naturium will see this, I would really love if the packaging could become recyclable in a future iteration. In my mind that's the only down side to this product.
faceoff_positive.headline: Truly the best eye cream-- please make recyclable!

faceoff_negative.comments: I tried out a whole Naturium routine and this is the only product that I literally cannot use. Stings/burns and has even caused a mild rash in the creases of my eyes- I don't even have sensitive skin! Absolutely bizarre and I see others have experienced the same thing.
faceoff_negative.headline: Only Naturium Product that Caused Irritation
